on reading compounds: 澱粉質【デンプンシツ】starchiness, starchy, farinaceous
沈澱【チンデン】precipitation, deposition, settlement (e.g. of sediment)
kun reading compounds: 淀み【よどみ】stagnation, deposit, sediment, backwater, faltering, hesitation, pause
淀み無い【よどみない】fluent, smooth, flowing
淀む【よどむ】to stagnate, to settle (at the bottom), to deposit, to be sedimented, to become sluggish, to become dull, to become stale, to be delayed, to hesitate, to falter, to stammer, to stumble
